@description.name: @description
@description.body:
The image widget displays an image file. Example Here is a little example of how to use the widget. 

   var image = new qx.ui.mobile.basic.Image("path/to/icon.png");
   this.getRoot().add(image);

This example create a widget to display the image path/to/icon.png.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: source {String?null} The URL of the image to display.
@param.description: The URL of the image to display.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired if the image source can not be loaded.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fired if the image has been loaded.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The URL of the image to display.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler for "changeAppScale" on application root. Reloads the image source.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Creates an overlay for this image which shows the image defined by the parameter 'highResSource', but has the same size and position as the source image. The original image widget is hidden by this method.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: highResSource {String} Image source of the high-resolution image.
@param.description: Image source of the high-resolution image.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: lowResSource {String} Image source of the low-resolution image.
@param.description: Image source of the low-resolution image.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event handler fired after the preloader has finished loading the icon

@param.name: @param
@param.body: source {String} Image source which was loaded

@param.name: @param
@param.body: imageInfo {Map} Dimensions of the loaded image

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the source attribute of the image tag.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: source {String} Image source which was loaded

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the attribute draggable to the given value "isDraggable".

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Gets the (computed) value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Sets the user value of the property qxOwner. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property qxOwner. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #qxOwner}.
